website_summaries.verdict: From DC's Heathrow Collection, the Heathrow Prestige is geared towards the casual modern lifestyle. It's a low-top designed with the brand’s classic skate-inspired silhouette. It’s also updated with lightweight construction for an active lifestyle.Comfort was made a top priority, ensuring great mobility and easy break-in. It's available at a budget-friendly price, which is no doubt a plus with all the features it delivers. At the same time, some wearers have found that the shoe didn't last all that long.
pros: The DC Cole Signature Shoe is a budget-friendly sneaker
Several users commented that the shoes felt very comfortable
A few buyers said that it was a good-looking shoe
A few users said that the DC Cole Signature Shoe was easy to break in
Several purchasers said that the shoes had a great feel for skating
One wearer said that the DC Cole Signature Shoe felt lightweight
Multiple color options are available for the shoe
One user said that the shoe doesn’t get easily dirty
cons: A few users didn't like the lack of arch support
A couple of users attested that the shoe wasn’t good for casual use
A few buyers said that the DC Cole Signature Shoe wears and tears away quickly
Several purchasers said that the shoe runs small

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WELL AS SKATE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who skateboards regularly, due to the high reviews. He wears them as both skate shoes and regular shoes. As regular shoes, he says they are fine, but not amazing. They feel like cardboard, and aren't too comfortable. As skate shoes, these are awful. He skated them once (not very intensely) and they immediately tore. The material that goes over your toes is very thin, and thus cannot withstand someone skating them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Go one size larger
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered one size larger. I normally wear a 10 and buy shoes that are wide (EEE) for comfort. But this being a skate shoe, I was about to go only a half size up but changed my mind and went a full size. Glad I did. Their 11 is actually a size 10! It's the same length as my sneaker. Toe box is the same as a 10 too. Other than the size label, it is a perfect skate shoe. Grippy on my board. Extremely comfortable without socks, nothing inside rubs. I'll update on the durability of the sole, but I'm gonna put it to the test on my longboard!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy from brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He loves them but they are a slightly different look than a normal DC. They are slimmer and the sole isnt as thick as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Overall I think they look nice but personally I would not pay more than $20 ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't feel anywhere near as solid as my other DCs. As other have said, the sole is very thin and the insole is of the simplest construction. Overall I think they look nice but personally I would not pay more than $20 for these.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Solano

customer_reviews.title: Another Good Pair of DC Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the tons of DC shoes I have bought over the years. I wear these mostly for just hangen around the office or going to the grocery store. They don't seem to be as good of quality as they were in the past, but that is probably just the model I got.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRat

customer_reviews.title: Good for a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Ive enjoyed skating in these and wearing them daily, not sure how long they'll last though. Wouldnt pay a fortune for them but a nice all-around skate shoe. Fits snug if you buy a half size up from normal (if your feet are wide like mine) but not uncomfortably so. Heel bruise is inevitable-get footprint insoles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, recommended!
customer_reviews.text: bought these for hubby, he loves them and wears them all the time to work, on hot days when boots are too much. He says they are comfortable, and they look great. he's had them for a while and they are holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I continue to be impressed with the comfort and wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I continue to be impressed with the comfort and wear on my DC shoes. They outlast my other brands I tried and just really hold up well. And for the price they surely are a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. For the price they can't be beat. I originally got them as just an extra pair of casual shoes but they quickly became my go-to, all day shoes. And after having them a few months with a lot of wear, they still look great and are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the third day I have worn them, and they are very comfortable. Soles are grippy, so they squeak a bit, but that is to be expected from this type of shoe. Note that the sole is relatively thin, so the shoe has more of a minimalist feel. This does not compromise comfort, though.
customer_reviews.author: R. MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, though cleaning them is difficult and tends ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, though cleaning them is difficult and tends to make them look less smooth than when I first purchased them. They are a but more frail than past shoes, but they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard these ran a little small so I stepped up a 1/2 size and they are pretty dead on. Great deal for these on Amazon at $33. Love the color with the gum bottoms. Always love DC's but yeah I have noticed since the change over to Quicksilver running them stud runs a bit smaller and fits a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Katz

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfect the size are the standard market sizes. The color is beautiful, feels durable and super conformable. the price was on point too. Couldn't be happier with them!!!
customer_reviews.author: adr7an

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes remind me of the good old days. Comfortable if you like walking around barefooted as there is no support and they are flat inside. I like them though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCrea

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband who has been wearing these every day since he got them. They look really nice on him.
customer_reviews.author: skwn

customer_reviews.title: My son't favorite skate shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These were to replace a similar very worn out and loved pair. My son is a true size 8 and he wears an 8 in DC skate shoes.

customer_reviews.title: confortable fashion
customer_reviews.text: I like simple things, this shoes got that and they feel even better than they really look. I recomend this one if you want to look cool an informal, besides you can use it with almost any clothes. the delivery and purchase process were all satisfactory for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good shoes in my opinion. I like how comfortable they are and how easily I can put them on. They work well with my skateboard. I've had them for about a week and there is a little bit of wear on them. I skate alot though, so I understand why. All and all, these are good shoes. I would recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband. He got so many compliments on them. He loves it. Super comfy!

customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Shoe was not as comfortable as other DC shoes I have worn prior. Lack of cushioning and felt stiff.

customer_reviews.title: nice concept, too narrow

customer_reviews.title: The Cole Pro is a fantastic shoe in every way I can think of
customer_reviews.text: I needed skate shoes at an affordable price, and these delivered. DC Shoes has been around for a LONG time, and it shows in their products. The Cole Pro is a fantastic shoe in every way I can think of.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the money, runs very slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: very good shoe for the price. thick enough walls to wear in winter, unlike some other DC and Vans shoes. size runs just the tinyest bit small, so if you're halfway between sizes, pick the larger size. I am an 8.5, this shoe feels like an 8.25.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in Price, not Quality

product_meta.title: DC Men's Cole Signature-M Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Blow up your local skate park with the pro ridden and approved DC® Cole Signature shoe! Chris Cole signature style. Uppers of durable suede and nubuck. Textile lining for breathable wear. Foam padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support. Clean toe design. Cupsole construction for optimum durability. Abrasion-resistant sticky rubber outsole adorned with DC's trademarked "Pill" pattern. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
